schema.description: An instance of a hotspot transform position.

phi.description: The position on the vertical axis in degrees
phi.title: Phi

radius.description: The radius, ie the distance between the camera and the hotspot
radius.title: Radius

theta.description: The position on the horizontal axis in degrees
theta.title: Theta

x.description: The position on the X axis of the world
x.title: X

y.description: The position on the Y axis of the world
y.title: Y

z.description: The position on the Z axis of the world
z.title: Z

schema.title: HotspotTransformPositionConfig
